bio.Involvements: Latino Business Student Association , Merage Financial Service - Student Assistant, Sigma Chi Fraternity, UCI Athletics
bio.Bios: Hey what’s up! My name is David Ayala, and I initiated in the spring quarter of my first year. When I have the time I enjoy lifting weights, playing basketball, and cooking. I’m also a sneaker collector/re-seller, my favorite shoe is the Jordan 1 “Bred”. Ask me about working out, NBA basketball, sneakers, and anything else!
